feed.title: Jose M. Perez's Blog
feed.subtitle: Web development, performance, and some other good practices.

entry.title: How to Estimate Web Performance Impact Before Making Fixes
entry.content: Web Performance is important for user experience and business metrics. Estimating its impact is key to be able to prioritize it, yet itâ€™s difficult to quantify its benefits until the work has been done.
entry.summary: Learn about several ways of assessing the potential performance gains before implementing improvements. This will help building the case and prioritizing performance work.
